cast.original_title: The Gods Must Be Crazy II
cast.overview: Xixo is back again. This time, his children accidentally stow away on a fast-moving poachers' truck, unable to get off, and Xixo sets out to rescue them. Along the way, he encounters a couple of soldiers trying to capture each other and a pilot and passenger of a small plane, who are each having a few problems of their own.
cast.title: The Gods Must Be Crazy II

details.biography: Sydney Chama is known for Zulu Dawn (1979), The Wild Geese (1978) and Cyborg Cop (1993).
details.name: Sydney Chama
